warn.urlDelete: The current URL is in use.
warn.dirDelete: The current directory is in use.
warn.trayDelete: The system tray is using the current URL, it cannot be deleted.

tip.delete: Cannot be recovered after deletion, are you sure you want to delete?
tip.syncOverwrite: Synchronization will overwrite all data except for custom data. Do you want to continue?
tip.syncReset: You are currently on the latest version. Synchronization will reset all data except for custom data. Do you want to continue?

error.title: This site can’t be reached
error.checkProxy: Checking the proxy and the firewall

confirm.delete: Are you sure you want to delete this record?
confirm.batchEnable: Are you sure you want to enable these prompts?
confirm.batchDelete: Are you sure you want to delete these prompts?
confirm.batchDisable: Are you sure you want to disable these prompts?
confirm.batchUse: Are you sure you want to use these prompts?
confirm.batchTagsAdd: Are you sure you want to add these tags?
confirm.batchTagsDelete: Are you sure you want to delete these tags?

message.missingActAndPrompt: Missing fields: 'act', 'prompt'. Try using 'Alias' to rename.
message.missingManifest: The manifest.json file is missing or invalid.

tip.proxyRules: Rules indicating which proxies to use.
tip.proxyBypassRules: Rules indicating which URLs should bypass the proxy settings.
tip.noiExtension: Note that Noi does not support the full range of Chrome extensions APIs. See Supported Extensions APIs for more details on what is supported.
tip.noiCacheMode: Caches webpage states for quick re-access, similar to browser tabs. Continuous state recording increases memory usage, especially when frequently accessing different sidebar links. To mitigate memory impact, especially during system lag, consider disabling or restarting the cache after multiple switches.
tip.promptLogLimit: Maximum number of prompts to retain in the log (10-1,000), with the default set to 300.
tip.promptLogArchiveLimit_1: Maximum number of prompts that can be stored in a single archive file (1,000-10,000), with the default set to 1,000.
tip.promptLogArchiveLimit_3: 2. Naming convention for completed archive files: {{file}}_YYYY.MM.DD.HH.mm.ss_YYYY.MM.DD.HH.mm.ss.json, where YYYY.MM.DD.HH.mm.ss represents the start and end times, respectively. For example: {{file}}_2024.01.01.12.00.00_2024.08.08.10.10.00.json
